name: My Adventuring Career
description:
Every few hundred years, two dragons would come and fight, leaving devastation in their wake. No matter which one would win, they both left with no thought to the people or the lands they destroyed.
The last time they fought, a group of heroes was able to get their attention and convince them to change their fight. They talked the dragons into letting the people decide who wins their fight. A tower was built and whosoever makes it to the top of the tower would declare the winner. Will you take on that responsibility?

Welcome to the adventuring life.
